clean_data: TIMESHARE SALES Summary I am extremely confident that my skills mentorship education and experience will set me apart from the rest Many would describe my character as someone who is always dedicated to the project at hand and willing to go the extra mile I ve managed large projects and provided meticulous attention to organizational processes and correct flaws when if they occur I am searching for a lucrative career in Sales as I have embodied the skill to connect with people ask the right questions and find the need and desire for the product or property Currently living in
